verbs.description: [ARG0: atiku] [V: needs] [ARG1: crash course on economy] says oduduwa group we wonder how an atiku who can donate lavishly to buy cars for women will find it wrong that nigeria wants to play its big brother role to other african nations vice president guinea bissau all progressives congress oduduwa group oduduwa president president muhammadu buhari dubai muhammadu buhari peoples democratic party sahara reporters kunle adewole federal government federal government of the united states nigeria russia atiku abubakar
